funcvsproc.title: Function vs Process
funcvsproc.response:
In simple terms, Functions will not continue the code it was called from until it is finished. Processes will do the opposite and create a new 'thread'. Below is a diagram to help demonstrate this.

For more information about functions, [click here](https://github.com/RyanLandDev/diamondfire-wiki/blob/master/docs/Code_Blocks/Functions.md).
For more information about processes, [click here](https://github.com/RyanLandDev/diamondfire-wiki/blob/master/docs/Code_Blocks/Processes.md).

*Diagram made by S4nders*

actionall.title: How do I do this to all players/entities?
actionall.response:
You can *shift-rightclick* any **Player or Entity action** to select the target this action will happen to. From here, you can click All Players to make the action apply to all players.

As an example, you can use **Player Action: Send Message** with the target All Players to send this message to all players.

textcodes.title: Text Codes
textcodes.response: Text codes are very useful! View a guide by [clicking here](https://github.com/RyanLandDev/diamondfire-wiki/blob/master/docs/Other/Code_Related/Text_Codes.md#text-codes).

contribute.title: Contributing to HelpBot
contribute.response: If you'd like to contribute to HelpBot, please check out its [GitHub repository](https://github.com/MCDiamondFire/HelpBot)! You can contribute using a pull request.

recode.title: recode
recode.response:
recode was a community-made utility mod with various QOL features to make
development easier and improve your DiamondFire experience.

**This mod is no longer being maintained**, check out ?codeclient instead.

codeclient.title: CodeClient
codeclient.response:
CodeClient is a community-made utility mod with various QOL features to make development easier and improve your DiamondFire experience.

You can download and view more information about it on it's modrinth page:
https://modrinth.com/mod/codeclient

mace.title: Mace Roulette
mace.response: A minigame made by user "flopsuh" that he has promoted on TikTok and Youtube Shorts, garnering large amounts of popularity.
